entity.name: images
entity.query: SELECT imageID AS id, label AS title, filename, keywords, slides.county, slides.created, slides.updated, old_findID, finds.id AS findID, periods.term AS period, findspots.declat AS latitude, findspots.declong AS longitude, findspots.woeid, CONCAT( findspots.declat, ',', findspots.declong ) AS coordinates, users.imagedir, users.fullname, licenseType.acronym AS licenseAcronym, licenseType.flickrID as license FROM slides LEFT JOIN periods ON slides.period = periods.id LEFT JOIN finds_images ON finds_images.image_id = slides.secuid LEFT JOIN finds ON finds_images.find_id = finds.secuid LEFT JOIN findspots ON finds.secuid = findspots.findID LEFT JOIN users ON slides.createdBy = users.id LEFT JOIN licenseType ON slides.ccLicense = licenseType
